ValidationRule.description: SF-646 This validation rule should ensure, that all Zip Codes are in the correct format according to their respective country. Format ("\\d{4}") or ("\\d{6}"). Example: 9999 or 999999.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Project_Address__PostalCode__s )), ISPICKVAL( Project_Address__CountryCode__s ,"AZ") ), NOT( OR( REGEX(Project_Address__PostalCode__s, ("\\d{4}")), REGEX(Project_Address__PostalCode__s, ("\\d{6}")) ) ), FALSE) && $Permission.Core_Project_Bypass_Validation_Rules = FALSE
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid format for the Zip Code! This should consist of four or six numbers. Example: 9999 or 999999
